body_html:
Personally I think originally putting MKLML stuff under caffe2/mkl was due to historical reason. It's better to live in contrib. As we proceed, we should remove caffe2/mkl and look at caffe2/contrib/ideep only. However, this is not a blocker. If there is confusion, we can always move them around.

@yinghai Make sense. Thanks for the clarification.

> Personally I think originally putting MKLML stuff under caffe2/mkl was due to historical reason. It's better to live in contrib. As we proceed, we should remove caffe2/mkl and look at caffe2/contrib/ideep only. However, this is not a blocker. If there is confusion, we can always move them around.

@yinghai Make sense. Thanks for the clarification.
